discourse_list.title: How successful are \xe2\x80\x9clisted\xe2\x80\x9d smart contracts, dapps and/or tokens on Ethereum?

content.content: I am a university researcher (See https://itrust.sutd.edu.sg/people/researchers/pieter-hartel/ ). I am asking you, as a developer on Ethereum, to spend 15 minutes of your time to complete an anonymous questionnaire on the success of smart contracts. I am hoping to learn what makes smart contracts successful and I promise to share the results with you via a followup post. Please find the link to the questionnaire here: https://utwentebs.eu.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_0lm2Lfu84u0lurH
content.GPT-summary: The author, a university researcher, is asking Ethereum developers to complete an anonymous questionnaire on the success of smart contracts. The author promises to share the results with the participants via a follow-up post.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is asking for feedback
